::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus frowns, thinking over the weaponry for a second. "Hmm. What I'm planning will require alot of weaponry that functions on the basis of kinetic energy. Bullets and the like."

As he talks, his comm replies to the message from Composer, unhearable externally: "Can you report to my position instead, Composer? I may need you to accompany me somewhere soon."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Huh? Oh, its that way," DevilDuer says, pointing in the general direction of Alliance island.
